mapper.insert: insert into member (num, id, pw, nic, name, birth, gender, phone, address, email, reg_date) values(member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pw}, #{nic}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw} and grade > 0
select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
